meanings.definition: A very thin line or crack
meanings.sent1: The hairlines in the old painting were barely visible.
meanings.sent2: She noticed tiny hairlines on the surface of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The hairlines in the sidewalk looked like miniature canyons.
meanings.sent4: The hairlines on the ice resembled delicate spiderwebs.
meanings.sent5: The hairlines etched into the glass sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The outline of a person's hair, especially along the forehead
meanings.sent1: Her hairlines framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: He brushed his hair back, revealing his distinct hairlines.
meanings.sent3: The hairlines on his forehead seemed to dance when he laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her hairlines were like a crown of silk around her head.
meanings.sent5: The hairlines of the actress were always perfectly styled in movies.
